description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1cm82","text":"This protocol describes isolation of nuclei from left and right 10 week old mouse adrenal glands from 8 founder strains (B6J, AJ, 129S1J, NZOJ, WSBJ, NODJ, PWKJ, and CASTJ), preparation of a single nucleus suspension, and fixation for single nucleus RNA-seq using Parse Biosciences. We process 1 rep from each strain per day; e.g. female rep 1 across all 8 strains. The main products we use are Parse Biosciences Nuclei Fixation Kit (v2) and Miltenyi Biotec’s gentleMACS Octo Dissociator with accessories. This protocol takes about 3.5 hours from start to finish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pq93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t13p","text":"The results are 2 aliquots of fixed single-nucleus suspensions for Parse per each of the 8 samples at \u003e= 2,500 nuclei/ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dikea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4f4f0","text":"The first part of the protocol describes tissue lysis and nuclei extraction using Miltenyi Biotec’s gentleMACS Octo Dissociator with accessories. The second part describes nuclei fixation using Parse Biosciences Evercode Nuclei Fixation Kit with v2 reagents. Due to low nuclei recovery, we modify the original Parse Biosciences Evercode fixation protocol (attached) by using half volumes of all fixation reagents. We do not fix extra nuclei for other assays such as SHARE-seq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpubo","text":"We recommend using a 5 ml pipette for aspirations and resuspensions \u003e 1 ml.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fijcn","text":"Record everything in the IGVF spreadsheet, “Samples into experiment” tab.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":16}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"345C30AA438B11EEA8450A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13M6-Ry6oXgkx94BHZOGioYPI6F_hWDqjGgcaNu2JNYs/edit#gid=636074467"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bt89l","text":"Label tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2v06f","text":"Pre-chill centrifuge to 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9i2bu","text":"Prepare ice buckets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fp7he","text":"Prepare 35 ml lysis buffer on ice in a 50 mL conical tube. Distribute 2 mL into 8 gentleMACS C Tubes on ice. Add 175 ul RNase inhibitor to the lysis buffer aliquot the day of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":69,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":113,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":120,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbdnf","text":"Prepare 3.5 ml NB + BSA. Add 44.1 ul RNase inhibitor included in Parse Biosciences fixation kit the day of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s1kd","text":"Prepare 1.5 ml nuclei buffer + RNase inhibitor for final resuspension. Add 18.6 ul RNase inhibitor to 1.5 ml nuclei buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":38},{"style":"bold","offset":75,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":80,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":83,"length":16},{"style":"bold","offset":102,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rpiv","text":"Thaw components of 1 Parse Biosciences Nuclei Fixation v2 kit at room temperature, then place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vdig","text":"Distribute 20 ul NucBlue Fixed Cell ReadyProbes into 16 PCR strip tubes for cell counting. Need 8 tubes for counting after nuclei extraction, and another 8 tubes for final fixed nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8kfd1","text":"Keep flash frozen tissue samples on dry ice until lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b4bc","text":"Drop whole frozen tissue into a chilled gentleMACS C Tube with 2 ml lysis buffer. Close tubes firmly and invert immediately, ensuring tissue is not stuck to the bottom or side. Keep tubes on ice and proceed immediately to dissociation. There should be 2 adrenal glands.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etlvu","text":"Run the gentleMACS Program 4C_nuclei_1 on the Octo Dissociator (~5 minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67v2u","text":"Remove tubes, ensuring tissue did not get stuck on the sides, and spin down in a 4C centrifuge for ~10 seconds to bring liquid to the bottom, then place tubes back on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":100,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ug1k","text":"Filter nuclei suspension through 30 um MACS SmartStrainer into a 5 ml tube. Fit a tube rack in ice for extra stability while filtering.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8oh9p","text":"Wash 30 um MACS SmartStrainer with 2 ml additional lysis buffer. Add 2 ml to C tubes, cap, and swish to recover any nuclei stuck to the sides and cap of the C tubes, then wash the strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3k3be","text":"Discard strainer and centrifuge the 4 ml nuclei suspension at 4C, 350g for 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":66,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":75,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dl5i","text":"Discard supernatant and resuspend nuclei pellet in 375 ul NB-BSA + RNase inhibitor and filter through a 40 um strainer (provided in Parse Biosciences kit) into a new 5 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":32},{"style":"bold","offset":104,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"717pi","text":"Add 125 uL Nuclei Fixation Solution to the filtered nuclei in 375 ul and mix 3 times. Do not over-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rd3h","text":"Incubate nuclei for 10 minutes on ice. Set 2 P200 pipettes to 40 ul and 125 ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2f0n","text":"Add 40 uL Nuclei Permeabilization Solution and mix by pipetting 3 times with the P200 still set to 125 uL. Do not over-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2p0a1","text":"Incubate 3 minutes with nuclei on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6shao","text":"Add 2 mL Nuclei Neutralization Solution and invert the tube once to mix. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1haeu","text":"Centrifuge at 4C, 750g for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cehi3","text":"Aspirate and discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5fvn","text":"Resuspend the samples in 150 ul Nuclei Buffer with RNase inhibitor without BSA and filter through a 40 um filter into a labeled 1.5 ml tube. Do NOT filter, will lose too much volume. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":42},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":141,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu26m","text":"Count nuclei. Use a 1:11 dilution factor, e.g. 2 ul + 20 ul dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":47,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91nr0","text":"Add Nuclei DMSO: 2.5 ul into 150 ul samples and gently flick tubes to mix. One minute later, add another 2.5 ul and flick to mix, then after another minute add a final 2.5 ul for a total volume of 7.5 ul. Mix by gently pipetting 5x with a P200 set to 75 ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":105,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":168,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":197,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5q5g","text":"Split nuclei suspension into 2 labeled tubes, 75 ul per tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh6lc","text":"Place tubes in a Mr. Frosty for storage at -80C. The next day, move tubes to boxes in -80C racks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":44,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c81g1","text":"Count nuclei. Use 1:6 dilution factor, 4 ul + 20 ul dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol to isolate and fix nuclei from flash frozen mouse adrenal glands for IGVF
